basic.label: Base Package
basic.description: No matter the size of your project - all our websites include the following features:

items.label: 100% Responsiveness
items.details: More than 50% of a website's traffic usually comes from mobile devices and tablets. We design mobile-first and guarantee a great user experience on all screen sizes.

items.label: Modern Browser Support
items.details: We support all modern browsers. We guarantee full functionality for all features. Supported are up-to-date versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Microsoft Edge.

items.label: Accessibility (Standard)
items.details: We structure websites semantically and implement content following best practices. This leads to principle accessibility. (e.g. screen reader). Note: Full accessibility check is offered as an additional service.

items.label: Google Analytics
items.details: You get access to Google Analytics tools. Get full insights on your audience. Traffic sources, languages, etc. Note: Google Account required.

items.label: Full Source Code Access
items.details: Without special agreement the source code will be public. (Open-Source Software). On request you'll get full access to the source code. Note: Github Account required.

items.label: Webdesign (Recommended)
items.details: What we do best. We draft your website, create style guide, wireframes and prototypes. Through iteration processes we finalize the design together with our customer. We consult on structure, colors, fonts, UI,  etc.
items.hint: We design your Website: Layout, fonts, colors, etc.

items.label: Infographics
items.details: We create graphics, icons, illustrations. We enhance your photos and assets using Adobe Photoshop.
items.hint: We create graphical assets that suit your content

items.label: Stock Photos
items.details: We handle search and acquisition of suitable stock photos.
items.hint: Search and acquisition of suitable design assets

items.label: CMS
items.details: You want to manage your website's content independently? We got you covered. We offer Content Management System (CMS) via prismic.io.
items.hint: Content Management System: Be in charge of your content

items.label: E-commerce
items.details: We integrate e-commerce solutions like Shopify.

items.label: Localization
items.details: International audience? We can support multiple languages and take care of localization.
items.hint: Localize your website with additional languages

items.label: Forms
items.details: We create custom forms. Note: We do not support server-side data handling our own. We support simple contact forms with Formspree
items.hint: Forms for newsletter, contact, quotes, etc.

items.label: Interactive Widgets
items.details: Animations, mini-games or interactive widgets - we create all sorts of browser-based assets

items.label: Accessibility +
items.details: We check with online validation tools to make sure your website fulfills all accessibility criteria. Details: http://a11yproject.com/

items.label: Browser-Support +
items.details: Additional Support for specific browser (version)

items.label: Hosting (Recommended)
items.details: Maximum speed, security and reliability: We host our products on Google Firebase. All websites are served using HTTPS.

items.label: Personal Domain
items.details: We register your desired domain (z.b. http://www.example.com) for you. We check availability and suggest alternatives if necessary. (via cyon.ch)

items.label: Personal Email
items.details: We setup an email-server for you. Should you own your own domain you can choose your own custom email-address. E.g. info@example.com (via cyon.ch)
items.hint: We take care of your email needs

items.details:
